com.att.aro.main

Class ResourceBundleManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.aro.main.ResourceBundleManager

  • public class ResourceBundleManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods for managing resource bundles that are used for localizing strings in the application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ResourceBundleManager()

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultBundle

        public static java.util.ResourceBundle getDefaultBundle()
        Returns the default resource bundle used in the application.
        Returns:
        A ResourceBundle object that is the default resource bundle used in the application.

      • getBuildBundle

        public static java.util.ResourceBundle getBuildBundle()
        Returns the resource bundle containing build information.
        Returns:
        A ResourceBundle object containing the build information.

      • getProfilesBundle

        public static java.util.ResourceBundle getProfilesBundle()
        Returns the resource bundle that contains information for the pre-defined device profiles.
        Returns:
        A ResourceBundle that contains the information for the pre-defined device profiles.

      • getEnumString

        public static java.lang.String getEnumString(java.lang.Enum<?> val)
        Returns a string from the resource bundle that corresponds to the specified enumeration value. If the specified enumeration value does not have an associated string in the resource bundle, the enumeration name is returned.
        Parameters:
        val - An enumeration value that specifies which localized display string should be returned from the resource bundle.
        Returns:
        A string that corresponds to the enumeration value, or to the enumeration name, if the value cannot be found.

      • getEnumStrings

        public static <T extends java.lang.Enum<T>> java.util.Map<T,java.lang.String> getEnumStrings(java.lang.Class<T> c)
        Returns a Map of strings that correspond to the specified enumeration value.
        Parameters:
        c - - The enumeration type for which the corresponding Map of display strings should be returned.
        Returns:
        A Map of displayable strings for each value within the specified enumeration.

      • getStringEnumMap

        public static <T extends java.lang.Enum<T>> java.util.Map<java.lang.String,T> getStringEnumMap(java.lang.Class<T> c)
        Returns a Map of display strings that correspond to each value in the specified enumeration type. This Map is essentially a reversed Map of the one returned by the getEnumStrings() method, and is useful for converting a user entry into an enumeration value. To get accurate results for this Map, the String value returned for each value in the enumeration must be unique.
        Parameters:
        c - - The enumeration class for which the corresponding Map of display strings should be returned.
        Returns:
        A Map of displayable strings that correspond to each value in the specified enumeration class.
